tools.name: GetTime
tools.description: Worker that returns the current time.

tools.name: WeatherSearch
tools.description: Worker that searches weather information. Useful when you need to find weather information.

tools.name: HotelSearch
tools.description: Worker that searches hotel information. Useful when finding hotel's price, location and other information.

tools.name: ExchangeRateSearch
tools.description: Worker that searches realtime exchange rates for you.

tools.name: Google
tools.description: Worker that searches results from Google. Useful when you need to find short answers about a specific topic.

tools.name: LLM
tools.description: A pretrained LLM like yourself. Useful when you need to act with general language model.
